function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Personal and immediate contributions may lead to a lack of academic rigor in addressing contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Risk of incomplete or inaccurate understanding of disease propagation and its impact","Mitigation":"Provide training and guidelines on maintaining academic rigor in contributions","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, contributors","Owner":"Research institutions, academic supervisors"},{"Description":"Anxiety and self-reflection can affect the ability to objectively analyze and address contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Risk of biased or emotionally affected analysis of disease propagation","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and training on maintaining objectivity in analysis","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, contributors","Owner":"Research institutions, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Focusing on faraway lands may result in neglecting local contagious disease propagation issues","Impact":"Risk of overlooking important local data and experiences in addressing disease propagation","Mitigation":"Encourage inclusion of local data and experiences in contributions","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, contributors","Owner":"Research institutions, local health authorities"}]}
